title: How many movies can 1 terabyte hold? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a large collection of 1080 movies. ,full length features to tv shows, and thus can say one TB will hold op to about 100–200 movies, depending on length and image complexity. This assumes use of MP4 format. These films and TV shows range from over one GB to over 10 GB per file. As compression schemes get better and storage bigger (carbon based storage is the future) movie storage will improve.
It depends on the quality of the movie. 720p movies can range from 750–2gbs while 1080 are around 1.5–5gbs and blue ray 6+. You can also get movies of 480p which can be around 500mb or lower.
